ChangeList.Description: Added the **pendingSteps** relationship to the [approval](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/approval?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **completedSteps** relationship to the [approval](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/approval?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **query** property to the [accessReviewScope](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessReviewScope?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **queryType** property to the [accessReviewScope](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessReviewScope?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **steps** relationship from the [approval](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/approval?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **status** property from the [approvalStep](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/approvalStep?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **assignedToMe** property from the [approvalStep](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/approvalStep?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Changed the type of the **reviewers** property in the [adminConsentRequestPolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/adminConsentRequestPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **accessReviewQueryScope** resource type.
Removed the **principalResourceMembershipsScope** resource type.
Removed the **accessReviewInactiveUsersQueryScope** resource type.
Removed the **principal** property from the [accessReviewInstanceDecisionItem](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessReviewInstanceDecisionItem?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the **principalLink** property from the [accessReviewInstanceDecisionItem](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessReviewInstanceDecisionItem?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **resource** property from the [accessReviewInstanceDecisionItem](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessReviewInstanceDecisionItem?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **resourceLink** property from the [accessReviewInstanceDecisionItem](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessReviewInstanceDecisionItem?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **servicePrincipalIdentity** resource type.
Removed the **accessReviewInstanceDecisionItemResource** resource type.
Removed the **approvalFilterByCurrentUserOptions** enumeration type.
Removed the **consentRequestFilterByCurrentUserOptions** enumeration type.
Removed the **batchRecordDecisions** method from the [accessReviewInstance](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessReviewInstance?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **filterByCurrentUser** method from the [approval](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/approval?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **filterByCurrentUser** method from the [userConsentRequest](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/userConsentRequest?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **filterByCurrentUser** method from the [appConsentRequest](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/appConsentRequest?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
